title: Identify the original
content:
One of my students used this in a project and called it Adorable.  
It’s a knock-off of I face I know, but I can’t put my finger on it.  
Anybody know what the original is?  
Cheers.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211950/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%202_67.png) | 9.78 KB |

 [‹ Digitizing handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34613 "Go to previous forum topic") [Simon de Colines and Antoine Augereau fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906211950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43810 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bmaloney

comments.content:
Never mind, I just figured it out.  
It’s Isadora.  
Cheers
